entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Hey loser. Coronavirus has killed over 130k people and this is what ur talking about?  You don’t take responsibility for anything. You don’t deserve to be president. 3.5 years has passed and the US is worse than it has ever been in modern history.  You’re a disgrace. Sad.
